page.title: 11FAMILY LIFE
page.content: Mr Waddilove gets up at seven each morning to milk their cow. One of their three children has to get to school in{Exeter}so she leaves at 20 to 8. They have bacon and eggs and coffee for breakfast. Milking the cow is the first thing that needs doing but in the winter some animals will need to be fed.Everyone helps on the farm. Ben is old enough to drive the tractor and they can all move the animals round the fields. They all have cooked dinner at one o'clock for it is tradition. All of their food is {home produced.}Beef, sheep, chicken, ducks, milk, bread, jam, marmalade, butter and Mrs Waddilove makes {clotted cream.}All the animals are checked each night. The children go for a ride Sunday afternoons and take the 2 dogs with them. On Tuesdays Mr Waddilove goes to{Hatherleigh Market.
